title: Back to School
description: 31-year old Kristi visits her old high school to pick up her niece. She's early, so she takes the opportunity to engage in some nostalgia.Mr. Smith is the strict Dean of Discipline. He spies Kristi wandering the hallways during school hours, dressed in her short skirt, translucent blouse and trashy leggings--obviously, yet another harlot ditching class and in need of discipline. And he intends to give it...
author: Dylan Cross
